definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: There’re blue sky，beautiful trees and big buildings ahead.
sentences.chinese: 晴空丽日，前面是婀娜多姿的树木和高楼大厦。

sentences.english: There was a heightened awareness of each sunny day, the beautiful of flowers, the song of the bird.
sentences.chinese: 对每一个晴天丽日，对鸟语花香，我的感触倍加强烈。

sentences.english: There was a heightened awareness of each sunny day, the beauty of flowers, the song of bird.
sentences.chinese: 对每一个晴天丽日，对鸟语花香，我的感触倍加强烈。

sentences.english: On summer's warm days, the coolness of Chengde gives the same pleasure to the visitors.
sentences.chinese: 在丽日和风的暖夏，承德的清凉依然。

sentences.english: There was a heightened awareness of each sunny day, the beauty of flowers, the song of a bird.
sentences.chinese: 对每一个晴天丽日，对鸟语花香，我的感触倍加强烈。

sentences.english: There're blue sky，beautiful trees and big buildings ahead.
sentences.chinese: 晴空丽日，前面是婀娜多姿的树木和高楼大厦。

definition: to shine brightly/(fig.) to perceive clearly
green willow and red flowers/all the colors of spring
see 清風明月|清风明月[qing1 feng1 ming2 yue4]
